function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of misinformation or incomplete information about workplace management practices and covid-19 response due to lack of validation and measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential cross-contamination between houses","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and
